story: You are here today. You are eating a pretzel, looking at little cards in pastel colors, talking about technology and the future and you go through a hypnosis session. You have to decide between:

You are at a bar looking for some coffee. Everybody is on their laptops on the same website. You take a laptop and smash it on the ground. The internet shuts down and accidentally the computer was the main server holding everything together.

Apple announced the invention of “iPhone Infinity”. This will be distributed around the world for free. In this iPhone, an AI (Hyper Siri) is installed that predicts the future from big data. However, you will have to provide all of your personal data to Apple. Would you choose to rely on this device?

You leave everything behind and you walk for days and days and you become a professional hiker. You look at the stars for orientation. You join a  forest community. There are tree houses, huts, collective yoga and everybody eats what they find in nature.  Every 15 minutes you have to hug somebody.

links.button_text: You want to be lazy with the help of technology

story: Your life has been improved. You are extremely healthy. However, now it is illegal to let the machine predict humans' behaviors. You can no longer continue using the iPhone infinity's function. Will you still use this prediction device?
You now have the same life as before.

Iris decides for you based on probabilites what is best. You basically don't take any decision anymore. At the Berliner Gazette conference, you attend a workshop where you learn how to make decisions yourself. The first exercise is breakfast. Decide over coffee or tea. You cry cause you can't decide. Some people try to sneak in phones to help them. Everybody encourages you that you can do it.

iPhone infinity gets upgraded and now you can implant this device in your body. If you decide to implant, the device will predict the perfect lifestyle for you based on your bio information. All data will tell you which action to take and what to eat next to improve your health. Will you implant the device?

You are tired to do so much work based on human abilities. You want to use technology to simplify life. You want to use artificial light for the home or watch a movie. Or buy a new dress and not make one. You leave on a quest in search of magnets. You meet an alternative group, which is using human neural interface to build internet. It envolves holding hands etc. Some people are routers.
Simplicity - everything remains natural and close to spirituality and nature
it is Sad thing, disease may recover and may not recover.
Nothing happened. it is lucky thing. And your judgment that don’t give a information to Apple was correct.

You conquer time and space and can be in two places at the same time. Borders don't matter anymore. There is no necessity of prediction because we can see everything at once. We are the global consciousness. You can do anything you want, you go beyond the limits of human being.
Industries of Biotechnology(Predictio of lifespan)
You have to receive natural death. Time of death is God only Knows……

Serious disease may be found in your health care data if you choose to send it to apple every day. However, if you opt in, you be subject to targeted advertising from various companies related to Health care.

In the virtual world, an avatar made from all of your data was born, and you are now able to live forever. This is a virtual space, so your life span is not limited anymore. Also, because you don’t have a body, you can even fuse yourself with another person and become a greater existence; or you can split yourself in pieces and become a world of your own.
Nothing happened. But A great deal of valuable data was handed to Apple.

You can abandon your body and input all of your data into a robotics. This way you can travel the universe. However, there are many unknown things in the outerspace that can not be percieved from the earth’s data. You become lost and lonely in the vast universe. You can not even die forever until you get hit by a meteorite. Is this a dystopia?
When disease is found early, human would get long life. You may not die any more.
We must decide my end of life by myself. It is ultimate decision and maybe final margins of freedom.
